channel.title: Check requires key to open and get reward
channel.description:
How can i make it so, you have to have a key to get the reward out of it, so an example would be
player clicks open check, message says, You need a red key to open
player gets red key
he opens chest, and he gets a partyhat in his inventory

item.title: Check requires key to open and get reward

but this question is different and requires a different code, do you know it?
